name: Knight Overloaded
description:
Night Overloaded is a roguelight survival game that reinforces strategic choices.

Beat enemies falling from the sky endlessly, and expand your inventory!


Arrange




Compose






- Arrange weapons to attack enemies, deploy items to strengthen weapons.
- Pick up gold and buy, merge, and place items.
- 15 waves in total
- 170+ items (including weapons)
- 10 levels of re-playable difficulty
